history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03232
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A DRUG REHABILITATION CENTER IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF KALIBO, PROVINCE OF AKLAN, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
